00015 namespace tpk {

00021    class AvgFilter2D : public Filter2D {
00022       public:
00023          AvgFilter2D(
00024             const unsigned int nsamplemax
00025          ) : Filter1(nsamplemax),
00026              Filter2(nsamplemax) {};
00027          AvgFilter2D(
00028             const AvgFilter2D& src
00029          ) : Filter2D(src),
00030              Filter1(src.Filter1),
00031              Filter2(src.Filter2) {};
00032 
00034          virtual AvgFilter2D* clone() const {
00035             return new AvgFilter2D(*this);
00036          };
00037 
00039 
00044          virtual xycoord operator<<(
00045             xycoord input               
00046          ) {
00047             Filter1 << input.x;
00048             Filter2 << input.y;
00049             xycoord output(Filter1.value(), Filter2.value());
00050             Mutex.lock();
00051             Value = output;
00052             Mutex.unlock();
00053             return output;
00054          };
00055 
00057          virtual void reset( 
00058             xycoord xy = xycoord(0.0, 0.0)   
00059          ) {
00060             Filter1.reset(xy.x);
00061             Filter2.reset(xy.y);
00062             Mutex.lock();
00063             Value = xy;
00064             Mutex.unlock();
00065          };
00066 
00068          virtual void tune(
00069             unsigned int nsamplemax   
00070          ) {
00071             Filter1.tune(nsamplemax);
00072             Filter2.tune(nsamplemax);
00073          }
00074 
00075       protected:
00076          AvgFilter Filter1;      
00077          AvgFilter Filter2;      
00078 
00079       private:
00080    // There is no default constructor or assignment operator.
00081          AvgFilter2D(); 
00082          AvgFilter2D& operator=(const AvgFilter2D& rhs);   
00083    };
00084 }
